net.sf.appia.protocols.group.remote
Class RemoteViewEvent

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.appia.core.Event
      net.sf.appia.core.events.SendableEvent
          net.sf.appia.protocols.group.heal.GossipOutEvent
              net.sf.appia.protocols.group.remote.RemoteViewEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class RemoteViewEvent
extends GossipOutEvent

This event is used to request a list of addresses for a given group. On reply, the message carried by this event contains the addresses of the members of the group specified, as well as the group's id.

See Also:
Message
